long_description: Take your training routine indoors during bad weather with the CycleOps Mag Trainer. Five levels of adjustable resistance allow you to vary your workout. Updated frame works with all standard wheels and now works with 29er mountain bike wheels (fits treads to 2.25 in.). The Cyclops Mag bike trainer features adjustable foot pads, a quick release handle and folding legs for storage.
short_description: Take your training routine indoors during bad weather with the CycleOps Mag Trainer. Five levels of adjustable resistance allow you to vary your workout.
